units.name: Mixing Pot
units.description: This pot is so big it is able to hold large amounts of boiling water. Inside, herbs can be mixed into potions.

units.name: Tannery
units.description: This pot is so big it is able to hold large amounts of boiling water. Inside, herbs can be mixed into potions.

units.name: Armory
units.description: You can enchant advanced armor here.

units.name: Forge
units.description: You can refine metal and forge weapons here.

units.name: Witch Doctor's Hut
units.description: You can create a variety of magical items here.

units.name: Workshop
units.description: You can create a variety of magical items here.

units.name: Smoke House
units.description: A small mud hut for storing items and food and you can smoke your meat.

units.name: Storage Hut
units.description: Keeps your personal stuff

units.name: Ensnare Trap
units.description: A trap good for trapping and killing animals
Set up Tent

units.name: Troll Hut
units.description: A little clay, some sticks, and some hides and you have a very nice home.

units.name: Mud Hut
units.description: A hut made out of mud. Good for sleeping in and collecting nearby meat

units.name: Troll Totem
units.description: Revives slain heroes

units.name: Teleportation Beacon
units.description: Teleports Units a short distance around it

units.name: Hunter
units.description: Fast and strong,the hunter is hard to beat in battle. He has the Net|r ability allowing him to hunt easier and catch enemies, he can learn Track|r which amplifies damage and gives vision on target. A good damage class.

units.name: Gurubashi Warrior
units.description: The Warrior is adept at tanking and smashing enemies. He gets damage reduction and his attack can hit enemies around him ,however he cant use track anymore. A pretty straight forward class.

units.name: Tracker
units.description: The Tracker is adept at chasing and tracking enemies. He got a nice spell kit allowing him to track down enemy troll.

units.name: Gurubashi Champion
units.description: The Juggernaut is the best fighting class in the game, he is big, he is fast and he hit really hard.

units.name: Mage
units.description: Slow with moderate damage,the Troll Mage is equipped with more offensive spells than the Priest. He has Null Damage|r and can learn many Offensive Spells|r. A good damage class.

units.name: Elementalist
units.description: The Elementalist is adept at controlling the elements,allowing him to cast powerful damage dealing spells.

units.name: Hypnotist
units.description: The Hypnotist is adept at controlling enemies thoughts and emotions. He can easily zap enemies energy by means of depression and got some crowd controll spells.

units.name: Dreamwalker
units.description: Dreamwalker has control over dreams, both his and his enemies. He can consume dreams of his enemies stealing their health and energy.

units.name: Dementia Master
units.description: The Dementia Master spent too much time studying dark magic and trying to talk with being from another world, he got alot of damage dealing spells.

units.name: Priest
units.description: Slow with low damage,the Troll Priest has many buff and healing spells. He has The Glow|r,which increases movement rate of nearby allies,and can learn many Defensive Spells|r. A good support class.

units.name: Booster
units.description: The Booster is adept at buffing up allies with magic spells. He doesnt have any healing spells,but he gets more offensive buffs.

units.name: Master Healer
units.description: The Master Healer is adept at healing allies with magic spells. He also has spells allowing him to mix/restore his mana and heat.

units.name: Sage
units.description: The Sage has reached the pinnacle of the Troll Shamanic Art, he can use ALOT of different buffs and healing spells.

units.name: Beastmaster
units.description: Fast and strong,the Beastmaster can tame pet which assist him in battle. His regular skill Spirit of the Beast|r gives 5% per level better chance to find babies and attracts wild animals. A good damage class.

units.name: Wolf Form
units.description:
The Shapeshifter is strong in battle and versatile, he can transform himself into a wolf,a bear,a panther or a tiger. Each form got a unique ability allowing the shapeshifter to either,get lifesteal,buff his allies armor and health regeneration,escape or cripple the enemy. |cffFF0202Can only choose 1 subClass!|r|cff7DBEF1

Difficulty: |r|cffFE890DMedium|r

units.name: Dire Wolf
units.description: Permanently transform into a Dire Wolf. \nDire Wolf can only consume raw meat and has various abilities related to generating and consuming raw meat.

units.name: Bear Form
units.description:
The Shapeshifter is strong in battle and versatile, he can transform himself into a wolf,a bear,a panther or a tiger. Each form got a unique ability allowing the shapeshifter to either,get lifesteal,buff his allies armor and health regeneration,escape or cripple the enemy. |cffFF0202Can only choose 1 subClass!|r|cff7DBEF1

Difficulty: |r|cffFE890DMedium|r

units.name: Dire Bear
units.description: Permanently transform into a Dire Bear. \nDire Bear is strong and durable fighter.

units.name: Panther Form
units.description:
The Shapeshifter is strong in battle and versatile, he can transform himself into a wolf,a bear,a panther or a tiger. Each form got a unique ability allowing the shapeshifter to either,get lifesteal,buff his allies armor and health regeneration,escape or cripple the enemy. |cffFF0202Can only choose 1 subClass!|r|cff7DBEF1

Difficulty: |r|cffFE890DMedium|r

units.name: Tiger Form
units.description:
The Shapeshifter is strong in battle and versatile, he can transform himself into a wolf,a bear,a panther or a tiger. Each form got a unique ability allowing the shapeshifter to either,get lifesteal,buff his allies armor and health regeneration,escape or cripple the enemy. |cffFF0202Can only choose 1 subClass!|r|cff7DBEF1

Difficulty: |r|cffFE890DMedium|r

units.name: Druid
units.description: The Druid is focused on using nature and his pets to support his team and turn the battle in his favor.

units.name: Jungle Tyrant
units.description: When the Beastmaster spend too much time in company of the wild, he start looking and behaving like a wild animal, the Jungle Tyrant is the second best fighting class in the game, he can absord hostile animal gene pool by eating them and gains an ability based on which type of animal he ate.

units.name: Thief
units.description: Weak in battle but good at escaping,the thief has a short ranged Blink|r and can learn a short term Cloak|r. He is good at stealing item and has the best night vision. A good gathering class.

units.name: Escape Artist
units.description: When a thief decides that physical strength and speed are the key to thievery, he become an Escape Artist. The Escape Artist is adept at using pure physical power to escape from enemies.

units.name: Rogue
units.description: Rogue has developed formidable combat skills as well as adapted his thiefs skills to help him in combat. Rogue is adept at physical combat and maneuvering.

units.name: Contortionist
units.description: When a thief decides that the best way to steal is by using magic, he becomes a Contortionist. The Contortionist is adept at evading enemies through magic spells.

units.name: Telethief
units.description: When a thief decides that the best way to steal is by using magic, he becomes a TeleThief. TeleThief has dimentional magic, providing combat utility to his thief abilities

units.name: Assassin
units.description: The Assassin has combined the physical strength with the evasion magic, he has alot of escaping spells, but also the ability to backstab enemy for a big burst of damage.

units.name: Scout
units.description: Weak in battle,the scout is a good vision controller. He has an Enemy Detector|r and can learn Reveal|r which reveals the area around it. He is good at locating enemies and animals. A good gathering class.

units.name: Hawk
units.description:
The Observer is adept at controlling vision. He can learn to drop wards to keep vision on an area and has a wide ranged reveal. |cffFF0202Can only choose 1 subClass!|r|cff7DBEF1

Difficulty: |r|cff1FBF00Easy|r

units.name: Trapper
units.description: The Trapper got an advanced radar allowing him to locate precisely animals and enemies. He also has the ability to place traps which either reveals enemy position or slow them down.

units.name: Spy
units.description: The Spy got the best radar and reveal possible,its nearly impossible to hide from him

units.name: Gatherer
units.description: Weak in battle,the gatherer is good at gathering items and crafting stuff. He can learn Radar Manipulations|r which uses the minimap to find items. A good gathering class. // Sub Classes ToolTip

units.name: Herb Master
units.description: The Herb Master Tele-Gatherers can mix herbs wherever they go. He can learn Tele-Gathering,a spell allowing him to teleport items picked up to a fire. Can tele-gather herbs. // SupserSub Classes ToolTip

units.name: Radar Gatherer
units.description: The Radar is adept at locating and gathering items, he got an improved Item Radar and he can learn Tele-Gathering,a spell allowing him to teleport items picked up to a fire. Cannot tele-gather herbs.

units.name: Alchemist
units.description: The Alchemist has discovered the secret of the Philosophers Stone which allows him to conjure potion effects.

units.name: Omni Gatherer
units.description: The Omni Gatherer got all the gatherer abilities possible, he can also warp items around him when he gets lazy.
